title: Fully furnished 1 bdrm apt, bright and airy
posting_body: ['Guarantors accepted!', 'Income verification & good credit needed.', 'Pay only $2175 per month for this lovely apartment!', 'Heating and hot water included in rent.', 'Internet and cable (Spectrum) is available.', 'Renting out a fully furnished, bright and airy apartment in a lovely neighborhood.', 'Easy third floor walk-up.', 'Get lots of space for the money in a great neighborhood (rated one of the best neighborhoods in NYC multiple times by NY Times, New Yorker and The Daily News).', '2 blocks from the subway (40th Street station); 12 minute train ride to Grand Central Station; 15 minute drive to midtown.', 'Lots of light in every room!', 'Great, safe, pre-war building typical to Sunnyside with high ceilings and beautiful trims.', 'Lots of character.', 'Beautifully renovated large eat-in-kitchen with full size dining table and benches and lots of open shelving in addition to the existing cabinets.', 'Hardwood floors throughout.', 'Large enough bedroom to fit a king size bed.', 'The bedroom has plenty of storage with two large dressers, hanging rack, and full closet.', 'The furniture is all tasteful and you will find it easy to make this place home right away!', 'Ample large and deep closets to fit all of your stuff!', 'Included in the apartment, in addition to the furniture, is an exercise bike, television, new microwave in the kitchen, and additional storage shelving in the bathroom.', 'Working from home is also a pleasure in this apartment!', 'The neighbors are fantastic and very helpful.', 'Vibrant and diverse neighborhood with lots to do.', 'Walk score of 98!', "Email quickly if interested, this apartment won't last very long.", 'SoHo, Nolita, Upper East Side, UES, Upper West Side, UWS, Lower East Side, LES, Chelsea, Tribeca, Midtown, Gramercy, Financial District, FiDi, Newport, Jersey City, DUMBO, Williamsburg, Queens, Flushing, Long Island City, LIC, Astoria, Woodside, Bayside, Long Island']
